name: Stickman - Killer of Apples
description:
Stickman loved hamburgers and sweets, but he was forced to eat healthy food. «Eating one apple a day, you will leave the doctor without work!» -his grandmother said, giving the immediate apple. Now Stickman hates this useful fruit. Apples killed his childhood, and now he kills them! Are you tired of useful fruits and vegetables? Say «no» to proper nutrition! Help Stickman to take revenge! Take a bow with arrows and shoot hateful apples! Go through 50 different levels and destroy the hateful fruit! Just don’t fall in your relatives and observe the number of arrows.

In the game you will find:

- Very popular hero of the game industry Stickman;
- Checking your ability to archery;
- Music in the style of "Hard Rock";
- 50 fun levels;
- Achievements Steam.
